alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 19 at 5:53AM EST until February 20 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Estill and Powell Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...From early this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding and expected to fall to around 14.6 feet by around 1 PM EST today and recede further to 9.4 feet around 7 AM EST on Monday. - Action stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued 3 PM EST.
